info.description: API for managing accounts, contacts, bills, invoices, and transactions.
info.title: Accounting Software API

get.description: Get a list of all bank accounts, cash, and credit cards with current balances.

post.description: Create a new bank account, cash or credit card.

get.description: Get details and current balance of a specific account.

put.description: Update details of an existing account.

get.description: Get a list of all payable bills, with current status and allocation info.

parameters.description: Search by bill number, notes, or vendor name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get details and allocation status of a specific bill.

put.description: Update details of an existing bill.

get.description: Get all payment transactions linked to a specific bill.
Get a list of all vendors and customers with financial summaries.

parameters.description: Search by name, email, or phone
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new vendor or customer.

get.description: Get details and financial summary of a specific contact.

put.description: Update details of an existing contact.

get.description: Get totals for accounts, contacts, bills, invoices, and recent transactions.
Get a list of all receivable invoices, with current status and allocation info.

parameters.description: Search by invoice number, notes, or customer name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get details and allocation status of a specific invoice.

put.description: Update details of an existing invoice.

get.description: Get all payment transactions linked to a specific invoice.
Get a list of all bank transactions (income, expense, transfer) with allocation info.

post.description: Create a new bank transaction (income, expense, or transfer).

get.description: Get details and allocation status of a specific transaction.

put.description: Update details of an existing transaction.

get.description: Get all bills and invoices linked (paid) by this transaction.

post.description: Allocate an amount from a transaction to a specific bill or invoice.

delete.description: Deallocate an amount from a transaction to a bill or invoice.
